item.title: Netflix’s Most Viewed Series for 2025’s First Half Is … Not ‘Squid Game’
item.description: ‘Adolescence’ sits atop the streamer’s semiannual data release, with the Korean smash right behind it.

item.title: ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ Opens to Solid Ratings, Building on ‘Original Sin’ Prequel
item.description: Paramount says more than 3 million viewers worldwide watched the show over its opening weekend.

item.title: Broadcast Falls Below 20 Percent of TV Use for the First Time
item.description: Netflix, led by ‘Ginny & Georgia,’ has a strong June and streaming once again outpaces traditional TV.

item.title: Netflix’s Taylor-Serrano Boxing Match Brings in 6 Million Viewers
item.description: That audience would make the fight the most watched women’s pro sporting event of 2025 so far.
